"But the fact that one recorder would pick up something and another recorde=
r just inches away would not=A0does support the theory about it being trans=
mitted right next to or directly on the electronics that write to the media=
."
=A0
This will blow your mind also. With Dr. Pompeii's audio spotlight he=
 can cause sound to manifest in 3D space as a bubble of sound. A person sta=
nding right next to you could not hear the music if you encased you in the =
bubble. The same works for his sound beam. To this day many museums use his=
 audio system to transmit display information without all the sounds mixing=
 and messing up your museum experience. The sound is produced with ultrason=
ic transducers instead of the traditional electrostatic speakers we all use=
.
=A0
Frank R.

--- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegho=
stresearch.com> wrote:


From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostres=
earch.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Dat=
e: Monday, June 8, 2009, 2:47 PM









Yes, you are right. Sorry, I am j=
ust beginning to learn about this area of research. Everything omits radiat=
ion at different levels. 
=A0
What=A0I should have said is=A0that true EVP =
aren't produced via sound waves in the range of human hearing. But the fact=
 that one recorder would pick up something and another recorder just inches=
 away would not=A0does support the theory about it being transmitted right =
next to or directly on the electronics that write to the media.
=A0
Sorry, =
my knowledge is very limited in this area so my terms may be incorrect or i=
nsufficient. Please correct me at will so I may learn all this properly.
=
=A0
April
=A0

----- Original Message ----- 
From: Frank Ratka 
To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups .com 
Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 1:38 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-IT=
C] New ideas








It sounds like she's saying "one, two, ....."
=A0
A mi=
stake that a lot of people make is thinking that there are two different ty=
pes of energy at work when it comes to sound waves and electromagnetic wave=
s. The only thing that seperates them is frequency and power. Radio waves a=
re radio waves because they occupy a certain block of the electromagnietic =
spectrum. Sound waves exist on that same spectrum just farther down with mu=
ch longer waves. Soundwaves and subsonic waves can penetrate almost anythin=
g because of their wavelengths. The shorter the wavelength the more ways we=
 can shield against them.
=A0
Think of microwaves. These are also a type of=
 radio and telemetry transmitting wave but the waves also have a physical e=
ffect on our environment by causing molecules to speed up, which creates he=
at. A little lower than this is IR or infrared it too can cause physical ob=
jects to heat up but usually it just causes molecules to rotate in place. A=
ll physical things give off IR light. Its a way the total system conserves =
energy by spontaneously emitting IR radiation.
=A0
Frank R.

--- On Mon, 6/=
8/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:


Fro=
m: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com>
Subject: Re: [E=
VP-ITC] New ideas [3 Attachments]
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Monday=
, June 8, 2009, 2:27 PM





Here is some food for thought. I am currently =
reviewing my audio from our May 30th investigation.
=A0
It was me and anoth=
er girl teammate=A0present in the room. I picked up a 3rd female voice on m=
y digital voice recorder that I carry with me. We were standing right next =
to another digital video recorder that I leave beside my night vision camer=
a. That recorder did not pick up this 3rd voice. I have asked the girl that=
 was with me to check her recording to see if she picked it up.
=A0
I have =
long felt the true EVP does not come from sound waves in the environment, o=
r then it wouldn't be EVP, but a disembodied voice. Somehow EVP's are appea=
ring directly on the recordings.
=A0
This instance with the recorders may b=
ack that theory up. That other recorder should have picked that voice up if=
 it were sound waves in the environment.
=A0
I am attaching the clip of thi=
s 3rd voice. The=A0file that is named=A0"01-02-17 Clip" is the full clip.=
=A0You will hear my voice as I say "Yeah", and then another comes in right =
after that. I think I know what it says.
=A0
Again, I was live monitoring m=
y audio, but still did not hear this until playback. It isn't clear, so I a=
m not as excited about it as my one's from the last investigation.
=A0
=A0
=

----- Original Message ----- 
From: Frank Ratka 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .=
com 
Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 1:09 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas

=







I have a running theory that EVP is carried on an untrasonic wave an=
d demodulated exactly where they want it to manifest. It works off the hete=
rodyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic waves that differ one another i=
n frequency then if you add or subtract them together you get a beat freque=
ncy or alternate frequency. For example, if a ghost is sending a signal at =
54KHz and you have an electric fan in a room creating an untrasonic frequen=
cy at 45KHz then you will have a intermediate difference=A0frequency at 9KH=
z, well within human hearing range (20Hz to 20KHz). This was just an exampl=
e, but all electronic equipment generates ultrasonic signals just by turnin=
g them on. From this theory I always felt that EVP were generated within a =
few inches of the recorder.
=A0
We are able to reproduce this affect in not=
 only radio with superheterodyne systems but also with acoustics and audio =
as in some passive sonars and a commercial produce called the "audio spotli=
ght" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.
=A0
Frank R.

9sz.zack@gmail. com> wrote:


From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com>
Subje=
ct: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Monday, June=
 8, 2009, 1:56 PM





Fascinating! I've had this idea that the EVP are oft=
en=A0not recorded by the microphone but somehow make their way in at the ac=
tual=A0point where the storage is made, whether it be analog (tape) or digi=
tal.=A0

So much we don't know ...
=A0
Zack

=A0
On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 1:3=
9 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:





=




I monitor my audio live. The funny thing is that even so, those last EV=
P's I captured I did not hear either in the environment, or on my recording=
 as it happened. I only heard them upon playback.
=A0


----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
From: Zack Widup 

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 



Sent: Monday=
, June 08, 2009 11:40 AM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas




I am curious =
if anyone with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP =
in real time.
=A0
I=A0took part in=A0an investigation of Ashmore Estates, n=
ear Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras set up in the t=
hree halls of the building. The video for all=A0was being monitored and rec=
orded=A0at a central location. Alas, we did not have microphones at the cam=
era sites conected to the central location. I wonder what we might have hea=
rd if we did?
=A0
Zack

=A0

 juno.com <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> wrote:

=A0

s discussion about her... 
Why don't we discuss something on a lighter note=
? Anyone have any new ideas about either evp or ITC? 
Al

<DIV>I have a running =
theory that EVP is carried on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly wh=
ere they want it to manifest. It works off the heterodyne principle. If you=
 mix two ultrasonic waves that differ one another in frequency then if you =
add or subtract them together you get a beat frequency or alternate frequen=
cy. For example, if a ghost is sending a signal at 54KHz and you have an el=
ectric fan in a room creating an untrasonic frequency at 45KHz then you wil=
l have a intermediate difference frequency at 9KHz, well within human =
hearing range (20Hz to 20KHz). This was just an example, but all electronic=
 equipment generates ultrasonic signals just by turning them on. From this =
theory I always felt that EVP were generated within a few inches of the rec=
order.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>We are able to reproduce this affect in=
 not only radio with superheterodyne systems but also with acoustics and au=
dio as in some passive sonars and a commercial produce called the "audio sp=
otlight" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.</DIV>
